subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description:
Strengthened capacity of local governments to plan, implement and manage their resouces to pursue the MDGs.
1. Design and development of the integratee web-portal
2. Improved capacity of relevant service providers and citizens to implement and utilize E-governance
3. Development of outreach materials for advocacy and awareness purposes
subproject.title: Enhancing Government 2 Citizen

title: Enhancing G2C Service Delivery in rural Bhutan
